47: Full Charge Bookkeeper We have an outstanding opportunity with a stellar company in the Monroe Area. This position is a Temp to Hire position, and they are eager to hire now! If you have the skills listed below, WE WANT YOU TO APPLY! Responsibilities Financial Information associated with incoming product and outgoing sales Invoices Accounts Receivable (Collections) Accounts Payable Payroll Biweekly Payroll Tax Bank reconciliation Desired Characteristics of future employees would be for them to be dedicated and eager to work. The right candidate for this role would also be self motivated and able to work independently as needed. Candidates must also have extraordinary written and verbal communication skills and problem solving skills. Qualifications Three years Validated experience with QuickBooks, Microsoft Office with extraordinary verbal and written communication skills are needed. Hours for this role are 7:30am-4:30pm with a 30-minute lunch Monday - Friday. Competitive Benefits Package Full Health Benefits Package, Paid Time Off, and 401(K) Does this position sound like it would be a good fit for you? If so Please click "Apply Now"!
